Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lelion Way, sickened by the smell of the Lyanden Swamp.
Room.LongDescription: The large swamp on the north side of the road is formed by the collection of stale water in the basin as a result of building Lelion Way. Normally, the water would exit to the ocean, but poor planning resulted in a sort of artificial dam, which left the area underwater. On the south side of the road are a number of shops in a large complex.
